post:
Hello all,

Looking for an absolute killer deal on a VPS? Our VPS will only set you back EUR 16 / year with minium specs up to EUR 22 / year with all specs maximized! Or you can choose to configure all specs to your needs and end up somewhere in between, it's all possible. All upgrades are only €1 a year extra!

What you get with this offer:

  • KVM VPS with Virtualizor control panel.
  • 1 vCPU Xeon Silver (Fair share CPU usage)
  • 512 MB / 1024 MB or 1536 MB Dedicated ECC RAM (configurable)
  • 7 GB / 10 GB or 15 GB NVMe SSD disk drive (configurable)
  • 10 GBps down / 2 GBps upload (Shared)
  • 256GB/512GB/1TB traffic (configurable)
  • Location: Frankfurt, Germany.
  • OS: Most Linux distros (Windows not supported)
  • 1x full IPv4 address (So no NAT!).
  • 1x /80 IPv6 subnet (or more through ticket).
  • Fully managable DDoS Protection + Firewall control panel.
  • DDoS notifications through Discord and/or E-mail.
  • Instant setup! (Depending on stock and fraud check).
  • These specs min € 16 to max € 22,- each year! (depending on configuration) plus tax if you’re from Europe.

Direct order link: https://minikvm.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=11

Network info and test: https://minikvm.com/network/

Before you order please read the TOS and FAQ here:

https://minikvm.com/terms-of-service/
https://minikvm.com/faq/


We accept Paypal, Credit Card iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@minikvm.com

Our company info:

MiniKVM (by NOVOS BV). We’re a company located in Belgium
